title: Transformers : Fall of Cybertron.Trainer.v.1.2.PLUS.16.options.L
description:
TFOC LinGon Trainer <c> Packed
Uploaded by : PirateHelix



HOW TO USE:
 
   Please make sure to press the info button on the trainer to view the options and hotkeys and additional Info.



Please start the "Game first" than one's the game running, minimize the game and run the trainer!
witch ever order should work, but starting Game first is recommended than use Alt Tab to minimize the game and run the trainer restore the game and Activate the trainer!


Important: before you can use the trainer options it's important to know that you must first Activate the trainer when the game has finished loading. 
To Activate the Trainer Please Press The "HOME" Key on your keybord when the game  has finished loading or while in game playing and wait for the activation sound to be heard.
after the the trainer has been activated the trainer is actiavted and you may select what option or options to enable.


TRAINER OPTIONS :

  F1 : Super Health
  F2 : Super Shield
  F3 : Infinite Campaign Shards
  F4 : Instant Ability Cooldown
  F5 : No Reload
  F6 : Infinite Ammo
  F7 : Super Accuracy
  F8 : Rappid Fire
  F9 : Super Speed
  F10 : Super Speed alternate(more speed)
  F11 : Super Jump(very high)
  F12 : Super Jump Boosted(very very high!!)
  Number 0 : Gravity Rush
  Insert Key : One Hit Kill(kill the enemie from one hit!!)
  Page Up/Page Down : Add 10000 Escalation Shards.This option will add 10000 Escalation shard each time you press this key
